title: Amazon shares hit record on blockbuster earnings report
text:
Amazon shares hit record on blockbuster earnings report 11:16pm IST - 01:18
Shares of Amazon soared to a lifetime high Friday after the online giant announced a rate hike for its Prime service and blew through all earnings expectations, with profits more than doubling compared to the same period last year.
Shares of Amazon soared to a lifetime high Friday after the online giant announced a rate hike for its Prime service and blew through all earnings expectations, with profits more than doubling compared to the same period last year. //reut.rs/2I20W2t
